settings.heading: Why Should You Join Us?
settings.content:
We met with 3000+ women post-Covid to understand their skincare needs and realized products that delivered results were tough to come by. And thus began Foxtale - a promise to create high performing products that work wonders for your skin, while you work wonders for yourself.
You can be a part of that journey too!
settings.contentunvisible:
Foxtale is the brainchild of Romita Mazumdar - the CEO & Founder at Foxtale whoâs all about creating high-performing products that work wonders for your skin. Itâs an endevaour inspired by stories of real women that we wear as a badge of honour.Â 
If youâre someone whoâs inspired by our story and is known for seeking out exciting challenges in the skincare space, then youâll love us! Oh, but thereâs moreâ¦

settings.heading: Looking for the perfect role?
settings.subheading: Well, weâve got you covered! Just share your resume/CV with us and weâll get back to you as soon as a opens up.Â

settings.content:
Who Are We Looking For?

You can apply if you have:

  • 1-4 years of experience in key account management - preferably in the skincare/beauty industry
  • An expertise in building and scaling brands across marketplaces like Amazon, Nykaa, Flipkart, and Myntra
  • Proficiency in MS Excel
  • The ability to build a rapport with key clients and handle multiple accounts

Strong negotiation, leadership, and communication skills are always appreciated!

What Would Your Role Entail?

  • Build the online marketplaces vertical at Foxtale by leveraging key partnerships with prominent e-commerce partners - Amazon, Myntra, Nykaa, and more
  • Be closely involved in the revenue/GM target planning & achievement, inventory/demand planning, and pricing & growth strategy
  • Aligning sales targets with e-commerce portals and making 360Â° marketing plans
  • Managing budget allocation on all marketplace channels and utilizing them for performance marketing and merchandise banners
  • Planning pricing and promotional & marketing expenses on a daily & monthly basis to ensure revenue/GM targets are met
  • Inventory planning & management across marketplaces
  • Negotiating marketing assets and deals with marketplaces

Who Are We Looking For?

You can apply if you have:

  • 4+ years of experience in an administrative role reporting directly to senior leadership
  • Experience in overseeing budgets and expenses
  • Expertise in developing internal processes and filing systems
  • Proficiency with office productivity tools and an aptitude for learning new software and systems
  • Strong time-management skills and an ability to organize and coordinate multiple concurrent projects

What Would Your Role Entail?

  • Manage professional and personal scheduling for the CEO - including agendas, email, phone calls, client management, and other company logistics
  • Manage senior leadershipâs travel logistics and activities like accommodations, transportation, and meals
  • Provide administrative and office support, such as typing, dictation, spreadsheet creation, faxing, and maintenance of filing systems and databases
  • Maintain and refine internal processes for senior leadership and optimize workflows
  • Organize team communications and plan organizational events
